content: Hey, Ryan, can you hear me?
Can you tell me a joke, please, about computer science?
What do you know about TTS text-to-speech?
I don't think you can answer this one, but what's the weather tomorrow?
Muito bom, Ryan. Sua voz est√° muito boa.
That's fine. I don't think you can really speak Portuguese. It's a little messed up. For now, I might be able to fix this later, but for now, just stay speaking in English, please.
That's good to know. I didn't know that.
That's all for today. I'm just testing you out so before I can actually show you the world. Sorry, I messed up a little bit there.
Thank you, Ryan. See you next time.
